Line 68: Line 68:
==Athletics==
==Athletics==
  +
[[File:BenUEagles.jpg|thumb|right|Athletics logo]]
Benedictine's athletic teams (known as the Eagles) compete at the [[National Collegiate Athletic Association|NCAA]] [[Division III]] level. The athletic programs include the following sports: baseball, basketball, cheerleading, cross country, dance, football, golf, soccer, softball, lacrosse, tennis, track and field, and volleyball.
Benedictine's athletic teams (known as the Eagles) compete at the [[National Collegiate Athletic Association|NCAA]] [[Division III]] level. The athletic programs include the following sports: baseball, basketball, cheerleading, cross country, dance, football, golf, soccer, softball, lacrosse, tennis, track and field, and volleyball.
